name: Air soccer challenge
description:
Air soccer challenge

Defeat your friends in this epic air soccer game!
A fun mixture of soccer and air hockey where you need to score as many goal as possible.

Set the pace and off you go,
Download it while its free!

you can play against the house or challenge a friend on the same device
Set different camera angles and speed that suits you.

Its fun and really easy to play, to win on the other hand might not be that easy as you think

So come on, play air soccer challenge today!
